verse: यतो वाचो निवर्तन्ते। अप्राप्य मनसा सह। आनन्दं ब्रह्मणो विद्वान्। न बिभेति कुतश्चनेति। एतं ह वाव न तपति।किमहं साधु नाकरवम्‌। किमहं पापमकरवमिति।स य एवं विद्वानेते आत्मानं स्पृणुते।उभे ह्येवैष एते आत्मानं स्पृणुते। य एवं वेद। इत्युपनिषत्‌॥
meaning: Meaning:From where words turn back, unable to reach with the mind, the knower of the bliss of the Supreme Brahman fears nothing from anywhere. Verily, he grieves not, thinking "What have I done right?" nor does he regret, thinking "What have I done wrong?" One who thus knows attains the Self. For both, indeed, this very self is attained. One who knows this, thus knows. This is the teaching of the Upanishad.
